argumentText:
ARGUMENT
p

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_prmnn | |- ( P e. Prime -> P e. NN ) |
| 2 |  | #P_nnnn0 | |- ( K e. NN -> K e. NN0 ) |
| 3 |  | #P_nnexpcl | |- ( ( P e. NN /\ K e. NN0 ) -> ( P ^ K ) e. NN ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ K e. NN ) -> ( P ^ K ) e. NN ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- { p e. Prime | p || ( P ^ K ) } = { p e. Prime | p || ( P ^ K ) } |
| 6 | 5 | #P_vmaval | |- ( ( P ^ K ) e. NN -> ( Lam ` ( P ^ K ) ) = if ( ( # ` { p e. Prime | p || ( P ^ K ) } ) = 1 , ( log ` U. { p e. Prime | p || ( P ^ K ) } ) , 0 ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ K e. NN ) -> ( Lam ` ( P ^ K ) ) = if ( ( # ` { p e. Prime | p || ( P ^ K ) } ) = 1 , ( log ` U. { p e. Prime | p || ( P ^ K ) } ) , 0 ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_df-rab | |- { p e. Prime | p || ( P ^ K ) } = { p | ( p e. Prime /\ p || ( P ^ K ) ) } |
| 9 |  | #P_prmdvdsexpb | |- ( ( p e. Prime /\ P e. Prime /\ K e. NN ) -> ( p || ( P ^ K ) <-> p = P ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_biimpd | |- ( ( p e. Prime /\ P e. Prime /\ K e. NN ) -> ( p || ( P ^ K ) -> p = P ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_3coml | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ K e. NN /\ p e. Prime ) -> ( p || ( P ^ K ) -> p = P ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_3expa | |- ( ( ( P e. Prime /\ K e. NN ) /\ p e. Prime ) -> ( p || ( P ^ K ) -> p = P ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_expimpd | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ K e. NN ) -> ( ( p e. Prime /\ p || ( P ^ K ) ) -> p = P ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ K e. NN ) -> P e. Prime ) |
| 15 |  | #P_prmz | |- ( P e. Prime -> P e. ZZ ) |
| 16 |  | #P_iddvdsexp | |- ( ( P e. ZZ /\ K e. NN ) -> P || ( P ^ K ) ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ K e. NN ) -> P || ( P ^ K ) ) |
| 18 | 14, 17 | #P_jca | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ K e. NN ) -> ( P e. Prime /\ P || ( P ^ K ) ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_eleq1 | |- ( p = P -> ( p e. Prime <-> P e. Prime ) ) |
| 20 |  | #P_breq1 | |- ( p = P -> ( p || ( P ^ K ) <-> P || ( P ^ K ) ) ) |
| 21 | 19, 20 | #P_anbi12d | |- ( p = P -> ( ( p e. Prime /\ p || ( P ^ K ) ) <-> ( P e. Prime /\ P || ( P ^ K ) ) ) ) |
| 22 | 18, 21 | #P_syl5ibrcom | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ K e. NN ) -> ( p = P -> ( p e. Prime /\ p || ( P ^ K ) ) ) ) |
| 23 | 13, 22 | #P_impbid | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ K e. NN ) -> ( ( p e. Prime /\ p || ( P ^ K ) ) <-> p = P ) ) |
| 24 |  | #P_elsn | |- ( p e. { P } <-> p = P ) |
| 25 | 23, 24 | #P_syl6bbr | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ K e. NN ) -> ( ( p e. Prime /\ p || ( P ^ K ) ) <-> p e. { P } ) ) |
| 26 | 25 | #P_abbi1dv | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ K e. NN ) -> { p | ( p e. Prime /\ p || ( P ^ K ) ) } = { P } ) |
| 27 | 8, 26 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ K e. NN ) -> { p e. Prime | p || ( P ^ K ) } = { P } ) |
| 28 | 27 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ K e. NN ) -> ( # ` { p e. Prime | p || ( P ^ K ) } ) = ( # ` { P } ) ) |
| 29 |  | #P_hashsng | |- ( P e. Prime -> ( # ` { P } ) = 1 ) |
| 30 | 29 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ K e. NN ) -> ( # ` { P } ) = 1 ) |
| 31 | 28, 30 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ K e. NN ) -> ( # ` { p e. Prime | p || ( P ^ K ) } ) = 1 ) |
| 32 | 31 | #P_iftrued | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ K e. NN ) -> if ( ( # ` { p e. Prime | p || ( P ^ K ) } ) = 1 , ( log ` U. { p e. Prime | p || ( P ^ K ) } ) , 0 ) = ( log ` U. { p e. Prime | p || ( P ^ K ) } ) ) |
| 33 | 27 | #P_unieqd | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ K e. NN ) -> U. { p e. Prime | p || ( P ^ K ) } = U. { P } ) |
| 34 |  | #P_unisng | |- ( P e. Prime -> U. { P } = P ) |
| 35 | 34 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ K e. NN ) -> U. { P } = P ) |
| 36 | 33, 35 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ K e. NN ) -> U. { p e. Prime | p || ( P ^ K ) } = P ) |
| 37 | 36 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ K e. NN ) -> ( log ` U. { p e. Prime | p || ( P ^ K ) } ) = ( log ` P ) ) |
| 38 | 7, 32, 37 | #P_3eqtrd | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ K e. NN ) -> ( Lam ` ( P ^ K ) ) = ( log ` P ) ) |
